name: Jax Bautista
text: Would absolutely recommend trying out this place. Exceptional mood, delightful dishes, excellent service. Great work.

name: James Leviege
text: Hungry Howie's is the best value pizza in the metro Detroit area. The star of the show, besides the buter cheese crust, is the salads. Great prices for great portions and quality.

name: Lindsey Maresh
text: When you order takeout from your phone, the location auto defaults to the very first location if nothing pops up. We were in Steinhatchee Florida outside of a HH that was packed full because they didn't have enough staff. I tried to order ‚Ä¶More

text: Ordered Hungry Howie‚Äôs last night. Pizza was perfect and the wings were the best we have had from a pizza place. Delivery was right on time too! Great job!

name: Graham H
text: Finest place to have some food when in a hurry. The service is swift, pricing is convenient, fantastic vibes. I highly recommend this spot.

name: Patrick Kornet
text: Terrible service, ordered a lite sauce, well done pizza and it came out as a flat bread pizza and crust was completely burnt.... terrible experience

name: Kristopher Prevost
text: Yumm-o! The food was flavorful, savory, and succulent. Make sure to save room for BreadSticks, because that was the best part of the meal! I found the ambiance to be very charming. Everything was just so yummy. I would eat here every day if I could afford it!

name: Kc- NWO
text: Ordered at 4:38pm it is currently 6:04pm and the tracker is still blinking on ‚Äúmake‚Äù. This is taking entirely too long and deters me from ordering again at this Hungry Howie‚Äôs.

name: Apri Horne
text: Went there for lunch the other day! Guy was very pleasant and courteous and thoughtful. Facility was clean. Definitely will go there again

name: Divya Kamath
text: I love Hungry Howies but terrible customer service. Rude, lying manager didn't call about pizza not being ready although online showed ready. Then, claimed her employee called to inform but didn't leave a voicemail. Changed versions and lied when in reality, we never received any phone call. Not ordering from this location anymore.

name: Del
text: Received terrible customer service. Pizza wasn't even started when I arrived at the pickup time. And the location never called. Wasted an hour of my time and refused any compensation for the time. Cancelled my order and got an amazing pizza from Green Lantern right down the street.
